column4: A particular Java applet does work in Opera, but not in Firefox3.5. How can they even make those things not work? Java Applets exist for more than 10 years already.
apparently we have many different Java VM, and different versions at that
I think Chrome on Windows is the only decent browser. Too bad it has no adblock.
As for one working in Opera but not in Firefox, yes I think it's a browser problem
